name: MIMIC (itch) (TheLostSun Studios)
description:
What if you are playing a game with "something" that perfectly mimics your every move? Can it be defeated ? And if so does that mean you have lost as well? 

3 DIFFERENT ENDINGS !

MULTIPLE MIND TWISTING PUZZLES.

IMMERSIVE PSYCHOLOGICAL HORROR.

A Psychological Horror Puzzle Solving 3D game.

The creature mimics your every movement meaning that it can't be defeated then , because if you win , 'IT' wins . So how CAN you win?

 ' The creature or Subject #23 has been observed to cause mental and physical distress to it's "opponents" in case of a tie up  and has never been acknowledged to have lost a game till date.

DISCORD :-

https://discord.gg/TxU9Z9wVn8
